title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each
descriptions:
Here is a product listing for the described product:

**The Republic of Tea - Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle - 36 Count Tea Bags Each**

**Introducing our Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle**

Get ready to cozy up with our delightful Fall Apple Teas Bundle, featuring two delicious herbal teas: Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple. This bundle includes 36 tea bags of each flavor, perfect for the harvest season and beyond.

**Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea**

Indulge in the warm, spicy flavors of apple cider, cinnamon, and cloves in our naturally-caffeine free Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea. This soothing blend combines apple pieces, cinnamon, orange peel, rose hips, berry leaves, natural flavors, ginger root, cloves, citric acid, and cardamom seeds to create a comforting cup.

**Caramel Apple Herbal Tea**

Savor the sweet, velvety flavors of apples, vanilla, and South African Rooibos in our caffeine-free Caramel Apple Herbal Tea. This delightful blend combines Rooibos, apple bits, natural apple and caramel flavors, and vanilla extract to create a treat for your taste buds.

**Steeping Instructions**

For the perfect cup, follow these simple steeping instructions:

* Water Temperature: Rolling Boil
* Amount of Water: 6 oz
* Steep Time: 5-7 minutes
* Additional Tip: Add used tea bags to compost or soil to reduce waste and nourish your garden.

**Bundle Details**

* 36 tea bags of each flavor (Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple)
* Ideal for accompaniment to the harvest season and as a dessert tea
* Perfect for tea lovers, hostesses, and those who appreciate a good cup

**Order now and enjoy the flavors of Fall all year round!**

**Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle**

**Product Name:** The Republic of Tea - Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle - 36 Count Tea Bags Each

**Product Description:**

Indulge in the warmth and coziness of the fall season with our Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle. This delightful bundle features two unique herbal teas, Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple, each with 36 tea bags. Perfect for sipping on a crisp autumn day or as a dessert tea, these caffeine-free blends are sure to become your new favorite way to unwind.

**Tea Details:**

**Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea:**

* A naturally-caffeine free blend with the flavors of apple cider, cinnamon, and cloves
* Ingredients: Apple pieces, Cinnamon, Orange peel, Rose hips, Berry leaves, Natural flavors, Ginger root, Cloves, Citric acid, Cardamom seeds
* Caffeine-free

**Caramel Apple Herbal Tea:**

* A caffeine-free blend with sweet apples, vanilla, and a base of South African Rooibos
* Ingredients: Rooibos, Apple bits, Natural apple and caramel flavors, Vanilla extract
* Caffeine-free

**Steeping Instructions:**

* Water Temperature: Rolling boil
* Amount of Water: 6 oz
* Steep Time: 5-7 minutes
* Additional Tip: Add used tea bags to compost or soil for a sustainable touch

**Bundle Details:**

* Each tea has 36 tea bags
* Ideal for accompaniment to the harvest season and as a dessert tea
* Perfect for tea lovers looking to try new flavors and blends

**Order now and get ready to cozy up with the warmth and comfort of our Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle!**

**The Republic of Tea - Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle**

**Get ready to cozy up with the warmth of fall!**

Introducing our Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle, featuring two delicious herbal teas that evoke the flavors and aromas of the harvest season. This bundle includes:

* **Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea**: A naturally-caffeine free blend that combines the flavors of apple cider, cinnamon, and cloves with a hint of spice. Ingredients: Apple pieces, Cinnamon, Orange peel, Rose hips, Berry leaves, Natural flavors, Ginger root, Cloves, Citric acid, and Cardamom seeds.
* **Caramel Apple Herbal Tea**: A caffeine-free blend that pairs sweet apples with vanilla and a base of South African Rooibos. Ingredients: Rooibos, Apple bits, Natural apple and caramel flavors, and Vanilla extract.

**Steeping Instructions:**

* Water Temperature: Rolling boil
* Amount of Water: 6 oz
* Steep Time: 5-7 minutes
* Additional Tip: Add used tea bags to compost or soil for a eco-friendly touch!

**Bundle Details:**

* 36-count tea bags of each flavor
* Perfect for accompanying the harvest season and as a delicious dessert tea
* Ideal for those who prefer caffeine-free options

**Treat yourself or gift someone special with this unique and delicious Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle!** Order now and get ready to warm up with the cozy flavors of fall!
